definition: get up and out of bed

The 'bed' is the implicit initial location from which the movement originates, as indicated by 'out of bed' in the definition.

sememes.reasoning: A core aspect of 'get up' is the transition from a reclining or sitting posture (in bed) to an upright or standing posture.

participants.reasoning: The 'Somebody' whose posture changes as a result of the action.
The implied resultant posture after the action of 'getting up' is upright.
